analysis.detail: Required driver configs not enabled: CONFIG_CIFS_UPCALL, CONFIG_CIFS_XATTR, CONFIG_CIFS_WEAK_PW_HASH, CONFIG_CIFS, CONFIG_CIFS_POSIX

vulnerabilities.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb: client: fix potential OOBs in smb2_parse_contexts() Validate offsets and lengths before dereferencing create contexts in smb2_parse_contexts(). This fixes following oops when accessing invalid create contexts from server: BUG: unable to handle page fault for address: ffff8881178d8cc3
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade to a patched kernel version
